name: Drive on Moscow
description: Drive on Moscow: War in the Snow, a strategy game from the award-winning makers of Battle of the Bulge, invites you to take command of the pivotal battle of World War II! Defend the homeland as the Soviets, or lead a bold push to seize the Soviet capital as the Axis.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Pentium 4 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512Mb DirectX 9 video card with shader model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
